scripts.build:cjs: yarn tsc -p tsconfig.json --outDir dist --module commonjs || true
scripts.build:mjs: yarn tsc -p tsconfig.json --outDir mjs --module es2022 --declaration false || true
scripts.build:rename: publish-scripts --cmd rename --srcDir mjs --outDir dist --findExt js --replaceExt mjs
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:mjs && npm run build:rename && rimraf mjs
scripts.clean: npm run build:clean && npm run clean:mjs && npm run clean:dist
